print('Hello World!')

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline


a = int(input())
b = int(input())
c = int(input())

print(a*b*c)


n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1
print(ans)
